ghostPost.title: How do I transfer ownership of my publication to another user on my team?
ghostPost.excerpt: Transfer the ownership of your publication to another user using the team management menu in Ghost admin.
ghostPost.meta_title: Transferring publication ownership in Ghost - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Transfer the ownership of your publication to another user using the Team management menu in Ghost admin.

primary_tag.name: Using Ghost
primary_tag.description: Guides, hints and tips for making the most out of the open source Ghost publishing platform.
primary_tag.meta_description: Guides, hints and tips for making the most out of the open source Ghost publishing platform.

tags.name: Using Ghost
tags.description: Guides, hints and tips for making the most out of the open source Ghost publishing platform.
tags.meta_description: Guides, hints and tips for making the most out of the open source Ghost publishing platform.

ghostPost.plaintext:
To transfer ownership of a publication, log into the site as the existing owner
and go to the “Team” settings. Click on the user from the team list to be made
the new owner. From their user profile, click the gear icon in the top right
corner and select, “Make owner.”

Only an administrator can be made a publication owner.
ghostPost.html:
To transfer ownership of a publication, log into the site as the existing owner and go to the “Team” settings. Click on the user from the team list to be made the new owner. From their user profile, click the gear icon in the top right corner and select, “Make owner.”

Only an administrator can be made a publication owner.
